name: Death's Door
summary: Reaping souls of the dead and punching a clock might get monotonous but it's honest work for a Crow. The job gets lively when your assigned soul is stolen and you must track down a desperate thief to a realm untouched by death - where creatures grow far past their expiry.
info:
• 开发: Acid Nerve
  • 发行: Devolver Digital
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox Series X/S
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 游戏类型: AAVG
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2021年夏
  • 官方网站: https://www.playdeathsdoor.com/
